On 7/26/05, Dave Brosius <dbrosius@...> wrote:
> I have it in my head t=
hat the junit folks recommend always calling
> super.setUp/tearDown from a =
user declared setUp/tearDown, even if the JUnit
> test in question is direc=
tly derived from TestCase. However i cannot find
> any written (web page) r=
ecommendation to so. Is this still the case? Is
> there a documented recomm=
endation some where?

Even if you cannot find the page, this is definitely =
a good idea. If
you decide at a later time to have your test case extend so=
mething
besides TestCase, your invocations of super.setUp/tearDown will
alr=
eady be in place.
